Package app.mines

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Actor
app.mines.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGActorCollisionListener, ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGBorderListener, ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGTileCollisionListener, EventListener
public class Tile extends ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Actor
Represents a tile on the game board which may contain a mine

  • Constructor Details

    • Tile

      public Tile()
      Creates an Actor with the necessary sprites for a Tile

  • Method Details

    • isFlagged

      public boolean isFlagged()
      Returns whether this tile is currently flagged
      Returns:
      true if this Tile is flagged, false otherwise

    • containsMine

      public boolean containsMine()
      Returns whether this tile contains a mine
      Returns:
      true if this tile contains a mine, false otherwise

    • setMine

      public void setMine()
      Designates this Tile as a mine location

    • open

      public boolean open()
      Opens this Tile if possible
      Returns:
      true if this Tile was opened, false if it was not

    • flag

      public boolean flag()
      Adds or removes a flag from this tile. Must only be called on unopened Tiles
      Returns:
      true if a flag was added to the tile, false if a flag was removed from the tile

    • showMine

      public void showMine()
      Displays a mine if this Tile is unopened and contains a mine. Called when the game is lost

    • isOpened

      public boolean isOpened()
      Returns if this Tile has been opened
      Returns:
      true if this Tile has been opened, false if it has not

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns whether this tile empty, meaning there are no mines in the Tiles that surround it
      Returns:
      true is this tile is empty, false if it is not

    • getSurroundingMines

      public int getSurroundingMines()

    • setSurroundingMines

      public void setSurroundingMines(int numSurroundingMines)
      Sets this Tile's surroundingMines and chooses the appropriate sprite to display once opened
      Parameters:
      numSurroundingMines - The number of mines in the Tiles that surround this Tile
